targets.expr: sum by(path) (fastapi_responses_total{app_name="$app_name", status_code=~"2.*", path!="/metrics"}) / sum by(path) (fastapi_responses_total{app_name="$app_name", path!="/metrics"})
sum by(path) (fastapi_responses_total{app_name="$app_name", status_code=~"5.*", path!="/metrics"}) / sum by(path) (fastapi_responses_total{app_name="$app_name", path!="/metrics"})
